Annotation.String: A Network Adapter represents a general purpose network adapter capable of connecting to a remote computer network.

A Network Adapter represents a general purpose network adapter capable of connecting to a remote computer network. Examples include but are not limited to Ethernet, Fibre Channel, and converged network adapters.
This action is to clear the settings back to factory defaults.
This action shall perform a reset of all active and pending settings back to factory default settings upon reset of the network adapter.
